targets.expr: sum(kubelet_running_pods{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}) OR sum(kubelet_running_pod_count{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"})

sum(kubelet_running_containers{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}) OR sum(kubelet_running_container_count{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"})
sum by(namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}) - sum by(namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"})
topk(10, max by(node) (max_over_time(process_resident_memory_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(operation_type, le) (rate(kubelet_runtime_operations_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))) > 0
sum by(operation_name, volume_plugin) (increase(storage_operation_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval])) > 0

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(operation_name, volume_plugin, le) (increase(storage_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval]))) > 0

topk(10, histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le) (rate(kubelet_pod_worker_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))) > 0)
sum by(instance, operation_type) (increase(kubelet_runtime_operations_errors_total{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval])) > 0

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(operation_type, le) (increase(kubelet_cgroup_manager_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval]))) > 0

topk(10, histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(verb, url, le, endpoint, node) (rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))))
topk(10, max by(node) (max_over_time(go_goroutines{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval])))
